org.xtext.xrobot.api

Class GeometryExtensions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xtext.xrobot.api.GeometryExtensions

  • public class GeometryExtensions
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper functions for Vectors. These are automatically imported as extension methods.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GeometryExtensions()

      static double minimizeAngle(double angle)
      Return the angle minimized to be in the range from -180° to 180°.
      static Vector operator_multiply(double scalar, Vector v)
      Return a new Vector with the coordinates of v multiplied with the given scalar.

    • Method Detail

      • operator_multiply

        public static Vector operator_multiply(double scalar,
                       Vector v)
        Return a new Vector with the coordinates of v multiplied with the given scalar.
        Parameters:
        scalar - the factor to multiply the coordinates with
        v - a vector
        Returns:
        a new vector with the coordinates of v multiplied with the given scalar

      • minimizeAngle

        public static double minimizeAngle(double angle)
        Return the angle minimized to be in the range from -180° to 180°. Use to minimize movements, e.g. instead of rotating 300° to the left you should rather rotate 60° to the right.
